verbose_text: PGC-1alpha activity is increased by oxidative stress [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], possibly through activation of AMPK [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] or p38 mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK) [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], or inhibition of glycogen synthase kinase 3beta, which inhibits PGC-1alpha through phosphorylation [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
